channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sand and paving slabs, 12th July
item.description:
Large amount of loose, bagged sand and paving slabs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Old Crossing Cottage Brockhampton Lane, Swindon Village

item.title: Series of potholes over a 100 yard stretch of Leckhampton Road, 12th July
item.description:
These potholes have been patched time and again and are all breaking up once more

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 189 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Downed tree. Looks like it was hit by a vehicle, 12th July
item.description:
Small tree on London Road opposite the church.l is snapped and on the pavement. Potential vehicle parts left next to it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 220 London Road, Charlton Kings

item.title: Cone not working on lights or lights not working for pedestrians. Also very slow for cars leaving folland avenue. Urgent., 12th July
item.description:

item.title: Huge potholes and protruding rocks across entrance to car park, 11th July
item.description:
Huge potholes across whole of entrance to Kilkenny Viewpoint car park plus large protruding rocks 3" high. Underside of car damaged. Noticed the leak after got home just a couple of mins drive from viewpoint so hopefully engine not ruined! Went back later to take photos and oil can be clearly seen in the pothole lakes. Car currently draining its remaining oil into trays! Please fill potholes before someone else gets their car ruined.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped fridge, 11th July
item.description:
In bush

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Barry Villa Dunalley Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructing use of pavement., 10th July
item.description:
Yet another skip overhanging onto the pavement along with an overgrown hedge. Seriously impeding passage along the pavement especially for the elderly, disabled and mothers with prams.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55a Alstone Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Street lght brightness too bright, 9th July
item.description:
Is it possible to operate the Street light between Number 3 and number 4 Granley Gardens at a lower power? It seems to be unnecessarily bright to me.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Granley Gardens, Cheltenham

item.title: Skip and overgrown hedge impinging access on pavement outside 55A Alstone Avenue, 9th July
item.description:

item.title: Broken manhole cover in road, 9th July
item.description:
The manhole was repaired last month but the cover is broken. It makes a very loud noise when a vehicle goes over it. The noise carries a long way and is a significant disturbance for all in the vicinity.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Pound House Gardens Cleeve Road, Gotherington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Surface Potentially Causes damage to vehicles, 8th July
item.description:
The road surface on Down Hatherley Lane, between A38 and Frogfurlong Lane, is in a very poor state of repair. The surface has almost been removed and causes cars to swerve to the other side of the road to avoid damage. There will be a serious injury on this road if the surface is not repaired to at least the condition fit to drive a normal vehicle on.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Water Reclamation Works Frog Furlong Lane, Down Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped paint pots, broken furniture and toys in alley, 6th July
item.description:
These items have been left for over a week at the entrance to the alley.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Hungerford Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
